pages.title: "How'd I get this?"
pages.text: Well, to put it quite simply, I stuck it in your pocket! You aren't the first odd looking fellow I've found passed out in the Overworld and certainly not the last. You didn't have any gear so I conjured up a copy of my book to assist you on your journeys. I regret I didn't have more to give you, but due to my small stature, carrying extra gear for others or even gear I can readily

part with is a challenge. In the envelope with this note you should have noticed a book. It's a simple guide that should help you survive out here, written by yours truly, Hael. If you decide you don't want it, I implore you at least take the recipes to heart with you that I've included on the following page for equipment that will allow you to do more advanced crafting:
